scripts.prepare-aescripts: cd plainly-aescripts && yarn install && yarn build
scripts.prepare-plugin: cd plainly-plugin && yarn install && yarn build
scripts.package: rm -rf package && yarn prepare-aescripts && yarn prepare-plugin && node ./scripts/preparePackage.cjs
scripts.husky-check: cd plainly-aescripts && yarn biome && cd .. && cd plainly-plugin && yarn biome
